evaluation: User study (qualitative); Deployment with users; User study (quantitative, controlled lab experiment)
contribution_desc: Presents a comparative evaluation of three methods for moving objects between personal mobile devices: Tray, Transfer Mode, and Device Touch. Reports on participants' preferences.
additional_hardware: stylus attached to devices to detect device bumping
crossdevice_def: cross-display object movement; multi-device interaction; multi-device environments
